Stride Against Cancer - Registration

"The world's light doesnâ€™t come from the sun it comes from Spreading love."

Have you ever been the reason behind someone's happiness? Even the imagination of experiencing that feeling was amazing Nah? Yes it is ..!!! Let us be a part of noble cause, Where no one ever comes to you in lack of happiness.

There was a well known slokaSarve Janah Sukhino bhavantu which means- Let the People of the world be happy.we shall together built a world of happiness brick by brick with love and care.

We the team of Aasya wants you to be a part our journey to share,to give,to feed,to care and to spread happiness. Come, join us now in our journey of Service.let us be the Change makers of tomorrow..!

You can actively participate in Stride Against Cancer by filling the following information..!

Note: If you desire to have Aasya T-shirt, Registration fee costs Rs.200/person.
